attributes.action: Make it ILLEGAL for ANY UK MP/PM to attend a secret society meeting or have contact with secret societies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can we be told that we live in a democracy when it appears that our MPs are attending secret society meetings where government policy is being influenced by non elected people from various countries not just the UK? If this is true then democracy in the UK is a sham.
